frame.name: Ordinal_numbers
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Item</fen> is picked out either by the order in which the members of a set would be encountered by an implicit cognizer, or by the order in which the members of a set participate in an event or state which serves as the <fen>Basis_of_order</fen>. The former case usually involves a <fen>Starting_point</fen> for going through the set, while the latter involves a <fen>Basis_of_order</fen>, which is normally an event that the <fen>Item</fen> along with other members of its <fen>Comparison_set</fen> has participated in. Note that <fen>Item</fen> should be annotated on a second layer, except in cases when the noun structure the ordinal participates in is predicative.
<ex>The <t>first</t> <fex name="typ">car</fex> <fex name="sta">from the left</fex> <ment>is</ment> a Magosix.</ex> <ex><fex name="ite">The first car from the left</fex> is a Magosix.</ex> <ex><fex name="Item">Barney</fex> <m>was</m> only the <t>second</t> <fex name="Type">Asian student</fex> <fex name="bas">at my college</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="ite">Felix</fex> <m>was</m> the <t>first</t> <fex name="com">of my cats</fex> <fex name="bas">to realize that human food was tastier</fex>.</ex> <ex>Felix was the <t>first</t> <fex name="typ">of my cats</fex> to realize that human food was tastier.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition:
<def-root>The kind of entity that the <fen>Item</fen> belongs to.
<ex>Capitalizes the first letter of the <t>first</t> <fex name="typ">word</fex> in each sentence</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Starting_point
FE.definition:
<def-root>A usually spatial reference point from which the implicit cognizer scans across the members of the <fen>Comparison_set</fen>.
<ex>Yes, I covered the cycle issue in the <t>second</t> paragraph <fex name="sta">from the top</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Basis_of_order
FE.definition:
<def-root>A kind of event in which the members of the <fen>Comparison_set</fen>, including the <fen>Item</fen>, participate in a certain order.
<ex>Lorna was the <t>third</t> student <fex name="bas">to be expelled from the Academy</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Item
FE.definition:
<def-root>The entity picked out by the implicit cognizer as occupying a certain place in the ordered <fen>Comparison_set</fen>.
<ex>Bennett is the <t>fifth</t> woman to be showcased.</ex> <ex>Bennett is <fex name="ite">the fifth woman to be showcased</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Comparison_set
FE.definition:
<def-root>A set of entites of which the <fen>Item</fen> is a member and which are ordered either by the <fen>Basis_of_order</fen> or by the order in which the implicit cognizer focuses attention on them.
<ex>The <t>first</t> student <fex name="com">of the college</fex> to cross the ramp will present the name-card reader with a card having the name of the college printed on it. .</ex></def-root>
